fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e1.equipments.boiler

Interface BoilerControlImplementationI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BoilerControlCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Boiler

    public interface BoilerControlImplementationI
    The interface BoilerControlImplementationI defines the operations to be implemented to control the boiler and its operation mode.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2020-10-02

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean activate()
      pass the boiler in the passive (active) state.
      boolean active()
      return true if the boiler is currently active (not suspended).
      double degreeOfEmergency()
      return the degree of emergency to reactivate the boiler after passivating it.
      void eco()
      pass the boiler on the economy mode of operation.
      int mode()
      get the current mode of operation of the boiler.
      boolean passivate()
      pass the boiler in the passive (suspended) state.
      void std()
      pass the boiler on the standard mode of operation.
      boolean switchOff()
      switch the boiler off.
      boolean switchOn(int initialMode)
      switch the boiler on.

    • Method Detail

      • switchOn

        boolean switchOn(int initialMode)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        switch the boiler on.

        Contract

         pre     initialMode == BoilerControlCI.STD || initialMode == BoilerControlCI.ECO
 post    mode() == initialMode
        Parameters:
        initialMode - mode in which the boiler is put initially.
        Returns:
        true if the boiler has been switched on, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Returns:
        true if the boiler has been switched off, false otherwise.

      • passivate

        boolean passivate()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        pass the boiler in the passive (suspended) state.

        Contract

         pre     active()
 post    mode() == mode().pre
 post    !active()
        Returns:
        true if the boiler has been successfully passivated, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • activate

        boolean activate()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        pass the boiler in the passive (active) state.

        Contract

         pre     !active()
 post    mode() == mode().pre
 post    active()
        Returns:
        true if the boiler has been successfully activated, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • degreeOfEmergency

        double degreeOfEmergency()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        return the degree of emergency to reactivate the boiler after passivating it.

        Contract

         pre     !active()
 post    return >= 0.0 && return <= 1.0
        Returns:
        the degree of emergency to reactivate the boiler after passivating it.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
